Discovery, The Middle East Zulal Wellness Resort - Serenity , The Middle East â€œFinding Emotional Balance & Freedomâ€ Retreat at Kamalaya, Thailand â€œHolistic Yoga Escapeâ€ Retreat at Kamalaya with Simon Low , Thailand +44 (0)20 3735 7555 Today: Closed Price match guarantee Contact Search hotel HOLIDAY TYPES DESTINATIONS HOLIDAY INSPIRATION OFFERS WELLBEING WISDOM ABOUT US WELLBEING AT HOME +44 (0)20 3735 7555 Today: Closed HOLIDAY TYPES DESTINATIONS HOLIDAY INSPIRATION OFFERS WELLBEING WISDOM ABOUT US WELLBEING AT HOME Meet Marina Efraimoglou, founder of Euphoria â€¹ â€º Marina is the founder of the holistic destination spa, Euphoria Retreat in Greece . Retreat won numerous awards and is regarded as one of the Europe's top wellbeing destinations spas. The retreat evolved from and represents Marina's personal journey of transformation. Marina was diagnosed with cancer in her 20s. She was driven by success in the world of banking which eventually led to exhaustion. Close to the brink she started looking for much needed balance. This led her to explore and study the Traditional Chinese Medicine, the Five Elements and other alternative heath methods. She also started visiting the world's top destination spas. All this led her to recovery and she then decided she would create a place where people with similar needs could feel at home and be nurtured and guided on their own personal journey to a more holistic, socially aware and spiritually satisfying way of life. Marina retrained in various modalities of Chinese medicine and began her work in transformational healing by leading workshops and retreats before ultimately creating Euphoria Retreat I the UNESCO protected town of Mystras. Marina has personally designed and oversees some retreat at Euphoria herself. These include 'Odysseus Journey', 'The emotional & physical transformation programme', 'Meaningful relationships, and new for 2021 'Feel Alive Again' which is a group retreat designed to offer post-pandemic support, rest and recovery. Marina is warm. vivacious and fun loving and many guests report that to work with her is both insightful and inspiring. For more details about Euphoria click here or call on of our wellbeing experts on 0203 735 7555. Why Wellbeing Escapes? Wellness experts Our team of wellness travel experts have visited the retreats themselves and include trained holistic therapists and yoga teachers. Their expertise in the wellness field and the retreats allow them to match you with the best retreat and programme for your individual needs. Value added benefits and discounts As the most established specialist wellbeing travel company we are able to provide excellent added value with our exclusive benefits including reduced prices for single travellers, free spa credits, complimentary transfers plus free nights and additional benefits for our repeat clients. Award winning service With over 15 years of experience, we have come to understand what our clients need from a wellbeing holiday. We treat each client as an individual and provide a personalised concierge service organising all aspects of your stay from spa and treatment programmes, transfers and flights with an efficient and friendly approach. Our continuous awards for customer service speak for themselves. ABOUT US Who we are Why book with us? Best price guarantee Contact us WELLBEING Wellbeing Wisdom Wellbeing Glossary WELLBEING HOLIDAYS Spa Retreats Detox Retreats Weight Loss Holidays Group Retreats Ultra Luxury Wellness Holidays Fitness Retreats Wellbeing Retreats Yoga & Meditation Retreats Ayurveda Retreats Medical Spa Retreats Health Retreats Nature Holidays TOP 5 COUNTRIES Thailand India Caribbean Italy Greece TOP 10 RETREATS Ananda in the Himalayas Absolute Sanctuary Chiva-Som Health Resort Euphoria Retreat Kamalaya Wellness Sanctuary Palace Merano Palazzo Fiuggi SHA Spain Shanti-Som Wellbeing Retreat Zulal Wellness Resort - Serenity About Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Â© Wellbeing Escapes 2025 Call Now WhatsApp No, thanks Sign up here to attend our Complimentary Wellbeing at Home Live online sessions with top Experts, Doctors and Practitioners SIGN UP

ABOUT US | euphoria top of page Euphoria Infotech Log In EXPERIENCED LEADERSHIP SHAMBA BHANJA MD / CO-Founder Mr. Shamba Bhanja, aged 52 years, is Promoter and Managing Director of our Company. He is the Founder of Euphoria Infotech (India) Private Limited. He holds a Master degree in Science from the University of Calcutta. He has extensive knowledge and experience in the field on software, ITÂ  and ITes of more than 22 years. He has expertise in the domain of telecom, education, government services, Internet of Things (IOT), Transport Management, Production and Supply Chain Management. The is the key behind the success of the Company at the present level. He is responsible for overall supervision and execution of projects at our Company. PRIYABRATA SEAL Director Business Development Mr. Priyabrata Seal, aged 47 years, is a Wholetime Director of our Company. He is a M. Tech degree in Multimedia Development from University of Jadavpur. He is having about 20 years of experience in the areas of project management, system architecture and account management. He plays a key role in the execution of projects and day to day operations. BAPPADITYA DASGUPTA Director Projects Mr. Bappaditya Dasgupta, aged 48 years is a Wholetime Director of our company. He holds a graduate degree in Physics from University of Calcutta. Â He has more than 20 years of experience in Software development, process delivery, quality control and data analytics. He plays a key role in the execution of projects and day to day operations AVIJIT MULLICK Independant Director Mr. Avijit Mallick, aged 39 years, is the Non - Executive Independent Director of our Company.Â  He holds a Bachelor degree in Technology, from West Bengal University of Technology and Postgraduate Diploma in Quality Engineering and Management from The Institution of Engineers (India). He is having experience of more than 11 years in the field of Software and Information Technology SRIYANS LUNIA Independant Director Mr. Sriyans Lunia aged 31 years, is an Independent Director of our Company. He is a B.Com (Hons) Graduate and having cleared Intermediate Levels of Chartered Accountancy and Company Secretary. He is having working Experience of around 8 years in the field of accounting, finance, taxation and legal matters. ABOUT US FASTER & BETTER. THIS IS HOWÂ WE DO IT.
